name: Very British picnic blanket
description:
Inspired by my camping trips around the British countryside, I made this retro picnic blanket from unused souvenir tea towels. I designed it with the carry strap and handle attached to the blanket, so that you never lose them, and it’s easy to fold away neatly. 

The top is 100% cotton. The back, edging, strap and handle are made from organic, Fair Trade, denim-coloured striped cotton. The blanket is fastened with two large burgundy buttons.

Dimensions 114cm x 140cm.
40oC wash, dry naturally.  
Made in Lewes, UK.  
Gift wrapped.
Expected arrival time within 4 working days to UK, 6 days to USA.  
P&P 2nd class within UK (Excl Channel Islands) £3.25. P&P USA £8.50.

name: Camper hats
description: I designed these children’s camper hats with a wide brim to keep off the sun and the rain. And they are reversible too, so your child can change their hat as easily as they change their mind. The camper hats come in two patterns: hedgehogs and hearts with a red spotty alternative for ages 2 to 4. And dinosaurs with a khaki spotty alternative for ages 4 to 9. Other children’s sizes can also be commissioned from us by email at no extra charge. Details 100% cotton. Reversible. Made in Lewes, UK. Gift wrapped. Expected arrival time within 4 working days to UK, 6 days to USA P&P 2nd class within UK (Excl Channel Islands) £1.25 (two is £1.50) P&P to USA £2.50

name: Striped camping pillow
description: After an energetic day at camp, rest your head against a cool organic Fairtrade cotton pillow finished with the relaxing scent of aloe vera. This camping pillow crushes down small and is tied at one end with ribbon. Detail Dimensions 30cm x 50cm. Pillow case is 100% organic, Fairtrade cotton jersey with an aloe vera finish. Cushion pad included: 100% polyester, sponge clean only.  40oC wash, dry naturally.  Made in Lewes, UK.  Gift wrapped,  Expected arrival time within 4 working days to UK, 6 days to USA.  P&P 2nd class within UK (Excl Channel Islands) £2.45 (two is £2.90).  P&P USA £6.90.

options.name: Burgundy and white striped with navy ribbon

name: Camper pillow
description: I dream of owning a camper van that we could take out in the winter months when it is too cold for the family to sleep in a tent. Detail Dimensions 30cm x 50cm. Cushion pad included, 100% polyester, sponge clean only. Pillow case, 100% cotton, envelope closure at the back. 40oC wash, dry naturally. Made in Lewes, UK. Gift wrapped. Expected arrival time within 4 working days to UK, 6 days to USA. P&P 2nd class within UK (Excl Channel Islands) £2.45 (two is £2.90) P&P USA £6.90

name: Caterpillow
description: When you are camping, keeping the children warm and happy is vital. For bedtimes, we always pack something special for them - and that’s where the caterpillow comes in. I designed the caterpillow to be lightweight to fit in my rucksack yet just the right size for tired little heads. It is made from snuggly thick polyester fleece with a padded machine-appliqued caterpillar fashioned from a variety of soft fabrics, including linen and cotton. Details Dimensions 30cm x 50cm Cushion pad included, 100% polyester, sponge clean only. Pillow case, 100% polyester with mixed fabric design, cotton edgings, envelope closure at the back. Handwash, dry naturally. Hand-sewn features. Applique filled with 100% polyester filling. No two caterpillows are the same. Made in Lewes, UK. Gift wrapped. Expected arrival time within 4 working days to UK, 6 days to USA P&P 2nd class within UK (Excl Channel Islands) £2.45  (two is £2.90) P&P to USA £5
